title: Question 5
prompt: According to the information above, which of the following is a primary cause of deforestation in Latin America?
description:
Click the one best answer to each question.

The map shows deforestation projections in tropical Latin America by the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) of the United Nations. By 2010, FAO projects that 62 percent of the deforested area in South America will be used for pasture.
feedback: According to the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations, 62% of deforested land will be used for pasture. Pasture is grazing land for cattle and other livestock, which are used to provide meat. An increased demand for meat leads to an increased demand for pasture, causing deforestation.
